twomillionlines.query module#

twomillionlines.query.internet(host: str = '8.8.8.8', port: int = 53, timeout: int = 3)#

Host: 8.8.8.8 (google-public-dns-a.google.com) OpenPort: 53/tcp Service: domain (DNS/TCP)

twomillionlines.query.query_tles_between(st: SpaceTrackClient, dtimes: list[datetime], save_dir: str = None, endpoint: str = 'tle') → list[tuple[str, str]]#

Gets all TLEs published in the range of datetimes passed

Parameters:

dtimes (np.ndarray[datetime]) – Datetimes, assumed to be UTC, in chronologically ascending order

Raises:

ValueError – If the object decays during the timespan

Returns:

List of TLE lines 1 and 2

Return type:

list[tuple[str, str]]

async twomillionlines.query.request(dt_start: datetime, dt_end: datetime, st: SpaceTrackClient, save_dir: str = None, endpoint: str = 'tle')#
twomillionlines.query.save_tles(dates: list[datetime], save_dir: str = None, endpoint: str = 'tle')#

Dates increasing please thanks

Parameters:

dates (list[dt.datetime]) – _description_
